document_data.name: ''Squint''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Squint''''' was an enchanted [[spyglass]] found in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Squint'' was a small collapsible tube with carved [[gem]] [[lenses]]. It was bound in [[gold]]en metal and wrapped in a bright purple ribbon, forming a trellis pattern.
document_data.Powers: Apart from the ingenuity of lenses allowing the user to see distant objects up close, ''Squint'' possessed an enchantment that allowed the viewer to place the ''[[eyebite]]'' spell on the target as well as disarm them for a brief time.
